translations: （静脉）曲张的；（腿）受静脉曲张影响的

sentences.sentence: Varicose veins are really just swollen veins and are caused by increased blood volume and pressure on the legs and feet.
sentences.translation: 静脉曲张其实就是肿胀的静脉，这是由腿部和脚部的血量增加和压力引起的。
膝盖酸痛，腿上静脉曲张。

sentences.sentence: Incidences of varicose veins among women will increase.
sentences.translation: 而且女性静脉曲张发病率会增加。
